alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 7:08PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Yankton, Bon Homme and Hutchinson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, 431st Avenue is flooded where it crosses the river in northwestern Yankton County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue rising to 15.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri James River Scotland 13.0 11.9 Tue 7 pm 12.4 13.1 13.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 1015 PM CDT.
